mapper.select: SELECT b.*, l.location AS locationName FROM bookings b JOIN location l ON b.location = l.id WHERE b.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE bookings SET room_number = #{roomNumber}, room_name = #{roomName}, postcode = #{postcode}, location = #{location}, start_date = #{startDate}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_date = #{endDate}, end_time = #{endTime}, message = #{message}, img = #{img}, av = #{av}, payment = #{payment}, del = #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookings(room_number, room_name, postcode, location, message, payment, av, start_date, start_time, end_date, end_time, img, del) VALUES (#{roomNumber}, #{roomName}, #{postcode}, #{location}, #{message}, #{payment}, #{av}, #{startDate}, #{startTime}, #{endDate}, #{endTime}, #{img}, #{del})
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.room_number, b.room_name, b.postcode, l.location AS locationName, b.location AS locationId, b.start_date, b.start_time, b.end_date, b.end_time, b.img, b.message, b.av, b.payment, b.del FROM bookings b JOIN location l ON b.location = l.id WHERE b.del = 0
SELECT b.id, b.room_name AS roomName, l.location AS locationName, b.postcode FROM bookings b JOIN location l ON b.location = l.id WHERE b.location = #{locationId} AND b.status = 1
